001package org.nasdanika.drawio;
002
003import java.util.Map;
004import java.util.Set;
005import java.util.function.BiFunction;
006import java.util.function.Function;
007
008import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
009import org.nasdanika.common.PropertySource;
010
011/**
012 * Base interface for {@link Model} elements
013 * @author Pavel
014 *
015 */
016public interface ModelElement extends Element, PropertySource<String, String> {
017        
018        /**
019         * Containing model
020         * @return
021         */
022        Model getModel();
023        
024        /**
025         * Containing model element
026         * @return
027         */
028        ModelElement getParent();
029        
030        String getLabel();
031        
032        void setLabel(String label);
033
034        String getLink();
035        
036        void setLink(String link);
037        
038        String getTooltip();
039        
040        void setTooltip(String tooltip);
041        
042        /**
043         * @return style property represented as a map
044         */
045        Map<String,String> getStyle();
046        
047        void setProperty(String name, String value);
048        
049        Set<String> getTags();
050        
051        boolean isVisible();
052        
053        void setVisible(boolean visible);
054        
055        String getId();
056        
057        /**
058         * Resolves some value for the model element by traversing its logical containment hierarchy and resolving that value against logical parents.
059         * For the containment root the value is resolved against the base.
060         * @param <T>
061         * @param base Base value is used to resolve the parent value
062         * @param resolver Resolver {@link BiFunction}
063         * @param connectionBase Indicates logical "mounting" of connections.
064         * @return
065         */
066        <T> T resolve(T base, BiFunction<? super ModelElement,T,T> resolver, ConnectionBase connectionBase);
067        
068        /**
069         * Resolves URI
070         * @param base Base URI for the root object.
071         * @param uriProvider Extracts URI from the model element.
072         * @param connectionBase Connection base (logical parent)
073         * @return
074         */
075        default URI resolveURI(URI base, Function<? super ModelElement,URI> uriProvider, ConnectionBase connectionBase) {
076                return resolve(base, (modelElement, parentURI) -> {                     
077                        URI uri = uriProvider.apply(modelElement);
078                        if (uri == null) {
079                                return parentURI;
080                        }
081                        if (parentURI == null) {
082                                return uri;
083                        }
084                        
085                        return uri.resolve(parentURI);                  
086                }, connectionBase);
087        }
088        
089        Page getLinkedPage();
090        
091        /**
092         * @return True if there is a link and it is in one of page link formats.
093         */
094        boolean isPageLink();
095        
096}
